title.value: US Core DocumentReferences Type Value Set

description.value: The US Core DocumentReferences Type Value Set is a 'starter set' of types supported for fetching and storing clinical notes. This value set is a subset of LOINC values listed in [HITSP C80 Table 2-144 Document Class Value Set Definition](http://build.fhir.org/valueset-c80-doc-typecodes.html)
